creator: shefali_kulks@yahoo.com
text:
Hai
   
I am using FO to generate reports. My problem is that i can't generate a report 
if the xml file size exceeds 480KB, but a pdf is genrated with a XML file whose 
size is below 480KB. When a file exceeds this range a ".pdf.tmp" file is 
created which is quite huge and though the process continues in the background, 
on the client side after some time, a "page not found" error is displayed.
(There is no change in the xsl file.)
  What i need is ..i should be able to genrate reports where the dynamically 
created XML file size exceeds 480KB..maybe a xml of size 1MB. 
  Can anyone suggest on how do i proceed? Any help will be appreciated..
*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 1063 ***
creator: j3322ptm@yahoo.de
